verbs.description: shane beamer to [V: become] [ARG2: assistant head coach at oklahoma lincoln] riley said during the lead - up to the rose bowl and in the days following oklahoma season ending that he was n't in any great hurry to fill the 10th assistant spot it turns out apparently that he was waiting for his target to wrap up his own season espn com reported monday that the sooners and riley would hire shane beamer who spent the last two seasons at georgia to round out the coaching staff oklahoma season ended with a 54 - 48 double - overtime loss to georgia in the rose bowl the bulldogs eventually lost to alabama in the national championship game beamer is expected to become the assistant head coach for the sooners currently defensive tackles coach ruffin mcneill holds that title it ruffin mcneill coach frank beamer cale gundy oklahoma lincoln riley sooners head coach shane beamer georgia
